entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Hello folks!

This will be just a short introduction to who I am and why I decided to create this blog. My name is Andrzej and currently I am doing my master’s degree in computer science at the Wrocław Univertity of Technology. 1

I always been passionate about mathematics and physics, it is more than certain that I will post something about that, I am also thinking about doing some computer science tutorials and also sharing some tips and tricks.

I am polish citizen (Poland country famous of its friendly citizens good beer and tasty cuisine kiełbasa & bigos :) so there is a slight chance that some of the content posted here will be in Polish but worry not I will try to stick with English so worry not. I hope we will learn new exciting things together! :)

  1. http://www.pwr.wroc.pl/index.dhtml ↩

Hello World! was originally published by Andrzej Łapiński at Andrzej Łapiński on June 22, 2015.
